com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.response

Class ResponseBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.response.ResponseBuilder

  • public class ResponseBuilder
extends Object
    Builder translating Throwables to ResponseWithErrorCodes.

    Note that CloudLoggerFactory is not used here to avoid recursion.
